item.description:
Becky Brown has offered to host our first Saturday evening potluck supper at 6:00 o'clock on February 5 at 18 Wedgewood Drive, Manchester, CT. Her house is less than two miles from the Route 6 Exit (Exit #60) off I-84.

Everyone should bring a dish and a bottle of wine or some water/soft drinks. Please indicate what you are bringing when you rsvp so that we can avoid duplication. If you need advice on what to bring, please call Becky at 860-649-0261 or me at 860-205-3715. If (like me) you are not skilled in the kitchen, you can always bring pane/formaggio/salumi/frutta.

Reserve soon because space may be limited.
item.name: un pasto alla buona - a potluck supper
